metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

properties.description: SonraiSecurity data connector with template version 3.0.0

connectorUiConfig.title: Sonrai Data Connector
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: Use this data connector to integrate with Sonrai Security and get Sonrai tickets sent directly to Microsoft Sentinel.

sampleQueries.description: Query for tickets with AWSS3ObjectFingerprint resource type.

dataTypes.name: Sonrai_Tickets_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
Sonrai_Tickets_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
Sonrai_Tickets_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

instructionSteps.description:
1. Navigate to Sonrai Security dashboard.
2. On the bottom left panel, click on integrations.
3. Select Microsoft Sentinel from the list of available Integrations.
4. Fill in the form using the information provided below.

properties.description: SonraiNewTicket_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0

Checks for new Sonrai tickets. 
It uses the action type to check if a ticket has been created
SonraiSecurity Analytics Rule 1
SonraiTicketAssigned_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0

Checks if Sonrai tickets have been assigned. 
It uses the action type to check if a ticket has been assigned
SonraiSecurity Analytics Rule 2
SonraiTicketClosed_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0

Checks if Sonrai tickets have been closed. 
It uses the action type to check if a ticket has been closed
SonraiSecurity Analytics Rule 3
SonraiTicketCommentAdded_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0

Checks if Sonrai tickets have had a comment added. 
It uses the action type to check if a ticket has had a comment added
SonraiSecurity Analytics Rule 4
SonraiTicketEscalationExecuted_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0

Checks if Sonrai tickets have had an escalation executed. 
It uses the action type to check if a ticket has had an escalation executed
SonraiSecurity Analytics Rule 5
SonraiTicketReopened_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0

Checks if Sonrai tickets have been reopened. 
It uses the action type to check if a ticket has been reopened
SonraiSecurity Analytics Rule 6
SonraiTicketRiskAccepted_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0

Checks if Sonrai tickets have had their risk accepted. 
It uses the action type to check if a ticket has had it's risk accepted
SonraiSecurity Analytics Rule 7
SonraiTicketSnoozed_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0

Checks if Sonrai tickets have been snoozed. 
It uses the action type to check if a ticket has been snoozed
SonraiSecurity Analytics Rule 8
SonraiTicketUpdated_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 3.0.0

Checks if Sonrai tickets have been updated. 
It uses the action type to check if a ticket has been updated
SonraiSecurity Analytics Rule 9
Sonrai Workbook with template version 3.0.0

| summarize count() by digest_criticalResourceName_s","size":0,"title":"Tickets per Resource (last 30 days)","noDataMessage":"No tickets found","noDataMessageStyle":3,"timeContext":{"durationMs":2592000000},"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart"},"customWidth":"50","name":"query - 2","styleSettings":{"maxWidth":"30%"}},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"Sonrai_Tickets_CL
| where digest_status_s == "NEW"

| summarize Count=count() by Date = startofweek(TimeGenerated)

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The Sonrai Security solution provides the capability to ingest Sonrai tickets into Microsoft Sentinel through the REST API.

Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:

This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in Preview state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs:

  1. Codeless Connector Platform (CCP) (used in GitHub Enterprise Audit Log data connector)

Data Connectors: 1, Workbooks: 1, Analytic Rules: 9

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
